attributes.action: Make it illegal for any UK minister to take any devolved away!
attributes.additional_details: The devolution settlement needs to and I also urge all parties to argue for this change!
attributes.background: “This means the devolvution settlement has to change”, as the Scottish government have said, regardless of what the Scottish people voted for in 2014. The UK government keep saying they have to retain powers to protect the UK single market.  We keep saying we don’t accept it and you don’t listen!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
